articles.title: RSV vaccine programme to be rolled out in Wales - BBC.com

articles.content:

articles.title: COVID-19 leads to long-term changes in the immune system, study shows - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: In a study recently published in the renowned journal "Allergy", a MedUni Vienna research team shows that COVID-19 leads to considerable long-term changes in the immune system, even in mild cases.
